attributes.action: Make it illeagal for BMW and VOLVO cars to use the outside lanes on motorways and all other multi lane roads in Great Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is common knowledge that Volvo and BMW drivers think they own the road, they are predominantly careless and arrogant. They hog the outside lane on motorways when other lanes are free. They do not believe in Mirror Signal Manouvre, in fact drivers of these vehicles believe they are the only vehicle on the road or that all other road users should be telepathic.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
